1.name: Kamala Harris
1.description: 2024 President Elect of the Democratic Party

1.title: Emotionally charged language
1.content: The individual consistently utilizes emotionally charged language that conveys a sense of urgency, dichotomy, and existential threat to rally support for their political stance. This language often frames political issues as a battle between two fundamentally opposing visions for the country, focusing on preserving democracy and safeguarding freedom against perceived threats.
evidence: My Administration will make it easier for small businesses to succeed.
My Administration will make it easier for small businesses to succeed.
My Administration will make it easier for small businesses to succeed.
